alert.note: Alert for Mariposa (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 17 at 9:43PM PDT until June 18 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in California... Merced River at Pohono Bridge affecting Mariposa County. Merced River At Happy Isles affecting Mariposa County. For the Merced River...including Happy Isles, Pohono Bridge...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Merced River At Happy Isles. * WHEN...From late tonight to late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Campgrounds at North Pines and Housekeeping Camp begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM PDT Saturday the stage was 7.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning by 945 AM PDT.
